ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Burynai bundt cake quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Both ranger  and druid in my guild have said that they foraged a bunt cake. I think it is just a bunt cake not the burynai bunt cake.  There are dronga
ygData.messageBody:
Both ranger and druid in my guild have said that they foraged a bunt cake.
I think it is "just" a bunt cake not "the" burynai bunt cake. There are
dronga quests where you combind items in various things like the forge, etc.
The names of the forage, brew barrel, etc. all imply that skill in the trade
is not a factor (NeverFail, AlwaysWork, etc etc.)

So, very probably, you need to get a bunt cake, get the recipe, get the
other needed items and bake it in the oven in Dronga.

Seems like Verant is trying to add more of these kinds of quests. They have
recently tried to complete the monk quest for the Whistling Fist Robe (?? I
think its a robe.) It's the completion of the headbands quest they had.
And they also said they were gonna patch so that skill in the trade is not a
factor.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
To: "EQBards" <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 12, 2000 8:27 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Burynai bundt cake quest


> This has been a topic on my guild mailing list lately. Some druid and
> rangers in the guild have been foraging in Field of Bone recently based on
a
> rumor that the bundt cake could be foraged there.
